result.markdown: --- title: "About" --- Welcome to the [effective data visualisation with R]{style="color:#006DAE;"} workshop! Tuesday 6th December 2022 9.00AM - 12.00PM AEDT Zoom (links provided to participants via email) ## Materials All materials are hosted on a GitHub repo [here](https://github.com/emitanaka/EDVR-workshop) and can be downloaded [here as a zip file](https://github.com/emitanaka/EDVR-workshop/archive/refs/heads/master.zip) (including the website, slides and exercises). Once the material is downloaded, open the `docs/index.html` in a browser to see this website ([emitanaka.org/EDVR-workshop](https://emitanaka.org/EDVR-workshop/)). ## Schedule ## Installation This is only needed if the exercise links above do not work for you. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} install.packages(c("remotes", "learnr")) remotes::install_github("emitanaka/EDVR-workshop/pkg") ``` ::: ## Exercises To run the exercises locally, install the packages under [Installation](#installation) and then run: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} learnr::run_tutorial("exercise-01", package = "edvr.workshop") learnr::run_tutorial("exercise-02", package = "edvr.workshop") ``` :::
